document_data.name: Thendric
document_data.mainbody: '''Thendric''' was a male [[human]] [[fighter]] and a [[generic temple guard|temple guard]] at the new [[Temple of Mystra (Wheloon)|Temple of Mystra]] in [[Wheloon]], [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Activities:
Thendric stood guard in the outer courtyard of the temple, and had a bunk in the guard post outside.

In early [[Eleint]] of the [[1374 DR|Year of Lightning Storms, 1374 DR]], Thendric was questioned by adventurers investigating the temple.Strangely, the module says "If the PCs ask about Thendricâ€™s claims (see below)", but no entry is given for Thendric (presumably missing in error), so his importance and these claims are unknown. In response, [[Shan Thar]] discusses the temple taking in prisoners from the [[Wheloon Jail]].
document_data.Equipment: The temple guards wielded [[longbow]] and [[longsword]], and wore [[scale mail]] armor.
